description.translate: As in the days of green moons and yellow woods.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Péctour\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Comme aux temps des lunes\"}","{\"text\":\"§7vertes et des bois jaunes.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7As in the days of green moons\"}","{\"text\":\"§7and yellow woods.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HER§a1 §7LUC§c-1\"}"]}}
